flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=810>>810 RSVP
Of those only 810*0.8=<<810*0.8=648>>648 people showed up
So only 648-10=<<648-10=638>>638 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180.0, not 810.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
